meanings.definition: A person who rides a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: The group of bicyclists rode together in the park.
meanings.sent2: Many bicyclists enjoy cycling on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The bicyclists had a race, but they kept falling off their bikes!
meanings.sent4: In the city, the flow of bicyclists resembled a colorful river.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bicyclists pedaling under the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: We saw a crowd of bicyclists at the cycling event.
meanings.sent2: The bicyclists waved happily as they passed by.
meanings.sent3: The bicyclists decided to form a team for the race.
meanings.sent4: The streets were filled with the laughter of the bicyclists.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bells from the bicyclists echoed through the town.
